title: Forza Horizon 3 Free Download Direct Link
description:
Forza Horizon 3 is one of the best arcade racing games in recent memory . Here you will find sunny Australia with its unusual tracks, an incredible number of cars, unrivaled graphics and much more And first of all I would like to say that if the previous parts of “Forza Horizon ” all the time “limped” due to insufficiently worked out physics, then in “ Forza Horizon 3″ this problem was solved once and for all.
Now cars feel fine on the track, drift well in corners, have become more controllable and, in general, have finally begun to correspond to their prototypes from reality. Well, if somewhere there are mistakes in terms of physics and handling, then you will not notice them, because most of the tracks are such that they are aimed at developing speed, and not testing with cornering . The visual design of the game has moved to a fundamentally new level of quality. Now you will be driving along the roads of beautiful Australia. But the new setting is not only new roads, but also bonuses in the form of new cars and new opportunities .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 250X @ 2 GB, DirectX 12
